subject: Pro plus washers
description_text:
hi
i wonder if youi could point me in right direction, im trying to find the
washers that hold the pinion in for the elastomer metal rod as shown in
picture i seem to have misplaced mine, i dont mind paying for them, if not
point me in right direction where i could obtain

many thx

andy

conversations.body_text: Hi Andy Barker,  We’ll check it and get back to you a bit later.
Hi Andy Barker,    Yes, two washers are missing. You can click this link to pay for shipping.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
